citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 p.m. on
03-APR-17.
No contact was made with any person at the facility. The licensee was contacted by telephone and stated he was
unavailable because of a medical appointment.
The licensee also indicated he intends to submit a request to cancel his license to the Fort Collins office.
